mapper.select: SELECT t.SCREW_COMBINATION AS screwCombination,t.PROCESS_CHARACTERISTICS AS processCharacteristics, t.PRODUCT_LINE_CODE AS productLineCode,v.PRODUCT_LINE_DESC AS productLineDesc FROM m_process_parameters t left join m_bom mb on t.PROCESS_CHARACTERISTICS = mb.PROCESS_CHARACTERISTICS left join m_shop_order mo on mo.BOM_BO = mb.BO LEFT JOIN m_product_line v ON t.PRODUCT_LINE_CODE = v.PRODUCT_LINE left join m_device md on md.PRODUCT_LINE_BO = v.BO and md.SCREW_COMBINATION = t.SCREW_COMBINATION where mb.SITE = #{params.site} and mo.SHOP_ORDER = #{params.shopOrder} and md.SCREW_COMBINATION is not null and md.SCREW_COMBINATION !=''
SELECT BO AS bo,CUSTOM_DATA_BO AS customDataBo,ATTRIBUTE AS attribute,VALS AS vals FROM m_custom_data_val WHERE ATTRIBUTE = #{machineProperties}
SELECT WORK_SHOP_BO FROM m_product_line WHERE SITE = #{site} AND PRODUCT_LINE = #{line}
